item.title: Did Louis de Broglie miss the discovery of the Schr\"odinger equation?
item.description: arXiv:2404.06366v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this note, we discuss a historical point regarding Schr\"odinger's discovery of the famous quantum wave equation in 1926 following de Broglie's fundamental works published in 1923-1925 regarding the introduction of matter waves. Drawing on the work of historians and personal analysis, we show that de Broglie was very close to the discovery of the Schr\"odinger equation (at least for the stationary one-electron problem).
